backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that includes blob storage mixin and provides contact form submission functionality with methods to store, retrieve all, and filter submissions by project type or email.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features related to fixing portfolio image references to use proper public asset paths from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the warm OKLCH color system, component structure, portfolio gallery with 26 available assets, and UI component library.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm, elegant color palette using OKLCH color space for both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title for Casa Di Vida, and script reference to main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component that sets smooth scroll behavior and renders Navigation, all main sections (Hero, Services, Portfolio, About, Contact), Footer, and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section displaying Casa Di Vida's design philosophy, four core values (Passion, Excellence, Client-Centered, Timeless Beauty) with icons, and a centered quote about their approach.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: React Hook Form-based contact form with validation for name, email, phone, project type select, and message fields, integrated with backend submission hook and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section layout with two-column grid containing ContactForm component and business information including email, phone, location, and office hours.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Casa Di Vida branding, quick navigation links with smooth scrolling, contact information, and copyright notice with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component with full-screen background image, Casa Di Vida title and tagline, call-to-action buttons for contact and portfolio, and an animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with logo, desktop menu, mobile sheet drawer, active section highlighting based on scroll position, and smooth scrolling to page sections.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioGallery: Portfolio gallery component with tabbed categories (Home, Office, Hospitality) displaying project images in a grid with modal dialog for viewing full-size images and descriptions.
Services section displaying four interior design services (Space Planning, Color Consultation, Furniture Selection, Full Room Design) in a card grid with icons, images, and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
React Query mutation hook for submitting contact form data to the backend actor, with automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind configuration defining a luxury interior design color scheme using warm earth tones, creams, and gold accents with both light and dark mode support.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom colors (using oklch color space), typography, animations, and luxury design system tokens for the interior design website.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the Casa Di Vida interior design website's features, architecture, and a known issue with broken portfolio images across all 4 categories needing path verification fixes.
